Race.SpecificTitle: PW Tax Continuation -- 0.60 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a tax of sixty hundredths of one mill (0.60 mill) on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $83,100 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of maintaining and operating public buildings in and for the Parish, said tax to represent a seven hundredths of one mill (0.07 mill) increase over the 0.53 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2015 pursuant to an election held on November 2, 2004, such increase having been effective beginning in 2012 due to reappraisal?

Race.SpecificTitle: 8th Ward Fire Prot. Dist. No. 1 -- 5.75 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
8th Ward Fire Protection District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall 8th Ward Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of five and seventy-five hundredths (5.75) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $54,750 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities in and for the District, including, without limitation, purchasing fire trucks and other related equipment, building and improving fire stations, and obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
